Utility Functions¶

Utils.py This script contains the methods which are used in the different modules of the project. This is the only file in the project where matplotlib.pyplot is import. Therefore, any methods for plotting should be written here.

created by Jalil Ahmed.

src.Utils.import_images(path, gray_scale=False)¶

Import images from a folder path

Parameters

  • path (str) – Folder path which contains images

  • gray_scale – (Default=False) Toggle if the images are gray_scale

Returns

Tuple of images and their names

Return type

(numpy.ndarray, list)

src.Utils.save_model_summary(summary_string)¶

Save the summary of the model

Parameters

summary_string (str) – Summary of model

Returns

None
